item.title: Automating Blog Comments with AI: GPT4All & Giscus Integration
item.description: What if your blog could automatically generate thoughtful comments for every post? I built a bot that does just that‚Äîusing GPT4All for offline AI and Giscus for seamless GitHub integration. No cloud APIs, no recurring costs‚Äîjust smart automation that engages with your blog posts.
